ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: in which only the most wretched will roast -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: No one will burn in it but the most wretched,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: where none shall burn except the most wicked,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: in which no one will suffer forever
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: None except the most wicked will enter it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: None shall enter it save the most wretched.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: None shall enter it but the most unhappy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: whereat none but the most wretched shall be roasted,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Which only the most wretched must endure,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: none shall enter it but the most wicked,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: None shall roast therein but the most wretched,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: which none shall enter except the most wretched [of persons]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: None shall reach it but those most unfortunate ones
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: None shall enter it save the most wretched,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: in which none shall be roasted except the most wretched sinner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: None will burn in it except the very wicked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [92:15] which none shall enter but the wretched one (al-ashqā means al-shaqī),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Which only the most wretched must endure) which only the wretched, as in Allah's foreknowledge, will enter,
